sub_title: Making your Organization FUTURE PROOF: Leveraging XR - AI - IoT & Exponential Technologies | Hackathon Guru (100+ organized) | Speaker (250+ keynotes & 3 TEDxTalks given) | Unconventional Playground Enabler
summary:
Actively training makers to become changemakers. Helped 325.000 individuals in becoming entrepreneurial between 2014-2023.  Shaping trends with them into business models, from Makers into Changemakers with social impact.

Setup several NGO's and was Former Board member of TEC Entrepreneurship Honours programme, a weekly mentee Program for starting entrepreneurs & Misfits (Wantrepreneurs). 

Wrote over 150 articles for 1.6 million readers via Articulum, Startup Grind, Influencive & Linkedin Pulse. Love to Co-create unconventional events that spark innovation. Today running communities in XR, AI, Education Technology and Sustainable living + tech development related communities. Fastening the speed of transition around the globe by empowering 150 high influence communities with active trendwatching. Advocate of global citizenship.

Organized & scaled up impact events like Future Flux Festival (700>2250 in 2yrs), representing the new Makers! In 2016 we hosted Campus Party Europe in The Netherlands, with 8900 attendees in 2020 over 1.4 Million on Reboottheworld.org. 

Seeking project opportunities that empower my ambition to impact a million lives in the next years by training Changemakers. 

I am an active serious gamer & Hackathons helped me develop:
- Find It - Pokémon Go for lost & stolen items -  app that uses the crowd to find items. (stopped in 2018)
- Stamboom - Art, tech & locals to tackle loneliness and empower locals to solve regional problems. (stamboom.strikingly.com - seeking 140k funding) 
- Morpheus.video (AI for superfast lipsync summary video's - Seeking CEO & CTO to lead the way) 
- Vertelknuffel.nl (Sambuddy a listening doll to get people out of social isolation - currently running 5 validation pilots & open for funding) 

You can hire me for:
- Event & project management (co-organized over 30 impact events)
- Community Empowerment (managing 10+ social media pages/Teams/Whatsapp groups)
- Teaching (guest lecturing in Entrepreneurship, Self-Awareness, PR, Marketing, Innovation & Scenarioplanning)
- Keynote speaking (experience with Wake-up calls, future tech, crowdsourcing, co-creation, social entrepreneurship, future of work, future of learning and future economies)
- Trend analysis & trend documentation
- Online Publishing

Graduated in Interdisciplinary Consultancy, Hospitality Management/Entrepreneurship & Innovation management

treasury_media.title: VR in EDU @MINDLABS 1 YEAR ROC TILBURG PRACTORAAT ANNIVERSARY.pdf
treasury_media.description: How to succesfully implement XR into your education, in this presentation I will walk you through 6 examples in different schools and give you hands-on advice on how to plan and develop it yourself.

treasury_media.title: FSCI Presentation Future of Hospitality through Technology lens NickvanBreda.pdf
treasury_media.description:
What technology will shape the future of Hospitality concepts? In this talk we discussed the various exponential technologies at the FSCI annual member event.

Hope it inspires you to go bold and become a social inventor aswell!

treasury_media.title: The Ananda ExO Sprint in Thailand -part of a showcase video
treasury_media.description: As an Exponential Organizations Coach, I helped the leadership team and operation managers of the Sasin School of Management design 10 new business models and work out 2 implementation plans for "Edge initiatives" in a 10-week ExO sprint process. This unique ExO Sprint in Thailand featured 3 organizations (Ananda Development, Dusit Thani & Sasin) & 5 teams of 7-8 persons in which we had a lot of cross-cultural experts and coaches involved in blending all insights into new business opportunities.

treasury_media.title: Time & Space travel in the era of digital twins | Nick van Breda | TEDxNijmegen
treasury_media.description: what will the future of learning look like, when working in 3D becomes the new normal, here is my take on a bright future where we can share ideas across the globe over an immersive new reality.

treasury_media.title: Is gaming bad for us? | Nick van Breda | TEDxYouth@BSN
treasury_media.description: What if I would tell you that you are also a gamer, that all of us are gamers and that we could change the world with identifying what type of gamer you are and than connecting you to a different type of gamer to tackle serious challenges of society together? Would you have a different look at gaming?

treasury_media.title: If tomorrow would be your last day, what would you do today? | Nick van Breda | TEDxYouth@Groningen
treasury_media.description: I shared my deepest and most personal story, my shift into a new me. My reborn was the result of lots of sorrow over the years, but it helped me reshape my whole life, turning my weak self into my skills to make the world a more entrepreneurial playground for change.

treasury_media.title: Campus Party Europe  in The Netherlands
treasury_media.description:
I was researching and designing a permanent Campus Party for my final thesis for the study Advanced Business Creation (now Business Innovation @Avans). I was also responsible for coordinating 27 Hackathons. This included the 200 persons EDUhack and managing sponsoring partners Kennisnet, Avans & EDUshifts & 26 other hackathon case sponsors.

I co-designed JIM and the Future Lab concept for exhibitions. See https://jim.spaces.nexudus.com/en & https://bit.ly/FutureLabJB

treasury_media.title: Future Flux Festival 2019 featuring 10 Years RDM
treasury_media.description:
I was the program manager for Future Flux festival in 2019. We managed in just 5 months to get 2250 people together on the topics of exponential technologies, student projects to scale-ups, investment in Port & Maker industry & Blending business and culture within the Rotterdam Makers District.
I was happy to help set up a great line-up that knew how to create new products and services for the Port. The result? Growth & learnings for everyone. New businesses were born!

treasury_media.title: Future Flux Festival 2018
treasury_media.description: I was the program director of Future Flux Festival 2018. It was my first time as program manager and had just 3 month to create a new brand identity for what set-up to be a cultural arts festival blended with the port. Two audiences that normally don't meet each other, with the rebranding we made it possible to have best of both and give all exhibitors and partners an annual festival to return to. It was a super exciting event in which I was able to cultivate my whole network to be part of this.

treasury_media.title: Singularity University Certificate
treasury_media.description: Singularity University is one, maybe the most progressive type of university you could find globally. You have two weeks to define which problem more than 100 million people are facing you are going to solve. Within 7 years after that you should be able to become a unicorn, making impact on millions of people. I volunteered to hear from some of those unicorns & actively coach businesses and startups in how to become one themselves with Exponential Transformation Theories.

awards.title: Participation Certificate International Creative Lab
awards.description:
Participation Certificate International Creative Lab
This document certifies that the student,

Nick Breda

Has successfully attended the International Creative Lab, performed in Lisbon, that took place between the 14th to the 16th of May, 2014 at IADE – Creative University and Madan Parque, Science Park of the New University of Lisbon.

awards.title: Innovation in a Week Certificate & 2nd place winner
awards.description:

The certificate proves succesful participation in Innovation in a Week. It confirms entrepreneurial abilities, perseverance, teamwork and innovation skills.
awards.issuer: Innovation in a Week (IIAW) - Business Creators B.V.

awards.title: Nominated for top 3 best research papers - The Future of Co-creation and Crowdsourcing
awards.description: I was nominated with two others to present my research paper in Lisbon on the yearly Edcom Conference on the 17th of May 2013. The presentation I gave was in the IADE where I met amazing people from all over the world. The research paper is published on both the EACA and edcom website that you can find over here: http://www.eacaeducation.eu/PageFromDb.aspx?page=Conference2013_presentations

A full-cycle business and innovation development, from concept ideation to product development.

Our final product & service improves the social cohesion within neighborhoods. At this point the product is still searching for investors, leave a message in my mailbox to get to know more about it.

projects.title: Can-Do Productions
projects.description:
It started as a website (nickvanbreda10.wix.com/can-do-productions) to make educational information free for everyone. This concept is further developed and expanded into online communities for young professionals, students, businesses and talented Individuals.

By looking to move to free educational resources (web ) seminars, books, programs and various e -learning programs encourage each other to develop skills and talent . For yourself and others.

Currently this is done in two forms. One is on the website and on the facebook page ( http://facebook.com/candoproductions ), Here it's done by inspiring videos, articles, interviews and trendanalysis. In addition, trends are briefly discussed in how it could impact our future - I started writing about how Dutch young startups are using them on www.articulum.nl, in the near future this will be done with deeper insights on a extra platform. MORE ABOUT THIS SOON.

The second form is in the form of a strong community, this happens currently in the Facebook group ''Can -Do Productions'' (https://www.facebook.com/groups/candoproductions) where everyone can be a member of . People show their talents and passion and build up a network and a strong expanded Curriculum Vitae which really helps branding theirselves and there innertalent besides just the courses or education they have done. It is intended that this community grows bigger so that they can collaborate on a platform in order to strengthen talent on another, for example by learning how to work with a program like Adobe Photoshop together aswell as extreme examples like spitting fire to achieve a spot in the Guiness book of Records. This ensures that attention is acquired by businesses and that talented people will work at the right place. That is what I call Co-creation combined with gamification because we encourage people to develop themselves and others further, in an interactive playfull and open way.

profile_positions.description:
As ICT and Education Coach & Teacher in XR (eXtended Reality) and A.I (Artificial Intelligence) for Avans, I help teachers redesign their courses leveraging Virtual, Augmented and Mixed Reality capabilities while also leveraging generative A.I and new interactive blended education tools to improve the students learning journey.

We would love to show you around in our BIMLab, Marquette lab & Makerspaces of ADGO (Academy for Sustainable Built Environment/Academie voor duurzaam gebouwde omgeving).
profile_positions.title: Information Communication Technology Teacher

profile_positions.description: Helping Breman Innovation (BREiNN) make use of the potential of XR and the Metaverse for their business and strategy goals to make all houses in the Netherlands energy positive by 2030.
profile_positions.title: XR & Metaverse Consultant

profile_positions.description:
With Maginex, we offer a Netflix solution for streaming XR content. A library solution for Education in which you can find A to triple AAA content for teaching with Virtual and Augmented Reality. 

We launched our beta in September 2022 and have had the pleasure to welcome over 40 schools since of June 2023. I am responsible for making sure content providers find the right schools via our platform and that content expands internationally so that the use of XR democratizes within the education and training industry.

In our day-to-day operations, we develop in partnership with Emagine BV custom-made content, with the intention of making it publicly and freely available on Maginex.
We connect content creators with our channel to school approach, in which all schools have free access to the platforms freemium content and 360 lesson creator tools - more creator tools to be launched every year!
We make sure that schools can use a Single Sign-on step to directly use the platform via their school credentials
We help them manage, install and run XR within full classrooms, with our streaming and managing solutions.
We offer insights for teachers and students so that they can reflect and review, for example, making quizzes and doing exams in Virtual reality, with a PDF output in students/teachers mailbox. 
We will add more functionalities so that we will have one content library for all levels of education, filtered out into your specific subjects, and modules and labelled/reviewed by educators to see directly which application helps on your learning objectives.

Become an XR Educator by using our creator of 360 scenario lessons today, reach out to receive some of our most valued content directly into your current Meta/ Pico or PCVR headsets by signing up on Maginex.nl

Our belief?
"Samen delen en verbinden is het nieuwe bezit'' - Let's start sharing to democratize quality education in XR!
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Vertelknuffel SamBuddy is a storytelling hug for education and healthcare

SamBuddy offers a listening ear to children with a request for help

The child decides for himself with the record button whether the story is recorded.
The supervisor who hands over the storytelling hug to the child is the only one with access to the recorded stories.
The Storytelling Hug is not connected to the internet.

The cuddly toy itself is made by the Knuffelfabriek in Breda, a foundation that is an employer for young people with an intellectual disability.

Startup, started on February 1, 2020, whose idea originated during the Epe Creathon (brainstorm event about the change of behavior of kids in classrooms resulting in high burnout rates among teachers and early psychological care aid from youth care)
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder Vertelknuffel

profile_positions.description: Helping design the event program of ICTU 2021, the 20 years celebration year of ICTU. Incorporating XR - both AR and VR and the development of both to co-work and facilitate unique meetings, a dedicated VR world and unconventional events.
profile_positions.title: Virtual Reality Development Specialist

profile_positions.description: Organizing and managing the first ever fully Digital edition of Campus Party. The most amazing Technology Festival globally with over 1.6M Campuseros tackling SDGs and building communities to make a positive change in society. The foundation supports Doctors without Borders and helps people out of poverty by offering a huge network of Makers who can upskill themselves to Changemakers and Education for Free to everyone by making all presentations freely available on YouTube. Join us for free via http://nl-digital.campus-party.org
profile_positions.title: Country General Manager

profile_positions.description: "OpenExO" is a global advisory firm that has been helping Fortune top 500 companies and Governments transition to exponential age. It's ExO (ExponentialOrganisation) framework and programs, enable disruptive innovation and exponential value creation(5X-10X) for the organisation and clients. Currently consulting for large corporates and Edtech teams
profile_positions.title: OpenExO Sprint Coach

profile_positions.description:
Offering consultancy in events & innovation management for businesses, schools and institutes.
Mentoring & Coaching students, management and directors to become entrepreneurs and intrapreneurs with custom made events and community engagement activities that can help the world become a better place.

You can approach me for the following services I offer:

–Startup & Business Consultancy (from ideation to implementation for startups / Corporate Innovation)
–Event planning & Hackathons (Creating transitions in old-fashioned markets & business models)
–Mentoring/Coaching of Students/Young Professionals (Supporting individuals on pursuing personal goals)
–Keynote speaking / trend presentations (Giving you and your organization a heads-up in your field of operations, completely zoomed into your sector with links to market, technological, cultural changes & macro trends).
–Publishing / Blogging / Online Marketing for events & Startups (PR/Engagement/Content marketing)
–Workshops in Business modelling, scenarioplanning, gamification, hackathon events & community management
–Other requests f.e. solar cooking workshops, social entrepreneurship, community management & startup travels
profile_positions.title: Company Owner

profile_positions.description: Making technology accesible for everyone bringing technology to every keynote, workshop and inspiration session around trends and tech to really showcase how technology can be applied by anyone to change the world for the better. Next to that I am hosting PFL within Hackathons, on Pop-up location for big events in the past: Campus Party & Future Flux Festival and social innovation events: Permanent Beta Days and Permanent Beta Festival. Next to that I have changed 10 libraries in Brabant already by offering 'Ik en Mijn Robot' lectures where trends translate to interaction with children and their parents around ethical and positive use of tech 🤖
profile_positions.title: Catalyst

profile_positions.description:
Joining the biggest crowdsourcing organization on realizing a new way of transportation with the Hyperloop. With over 800 teammembers from companies as Google, Tesla, Nest, Apple, the best student engineers and the inventor of the vacuum tube we believe that dreams can be made true without having a centralized business but a self-organizing swarm of talent who have one mission: To make Hyperloop a reality. 

My role will be supporting the event team and initiating more events like hackathons to gather the brightest minds and my experience as a co-creation facilitator to get the most out of short periods of physical collaboration time in pressure cooks and think-tanks.
profile_positions.title: Hackathons & Business Development

volunteer_experiences.description:
Responsible for the social media channels of the table tennisclub. Next to that working on public relations, helping to attract more people to enjoy tabeltennis by volunteering on many different levels, also in creating plans for attracting more sponsors to help us broaden the sport to other audiences (handicapped, elderly, business and premier league).

Setting up marketing campaigns and creation long term relations with stakeholders of the club is also part of the responsibilities.

Next to the volunteering I am also practicing the sport since the age of 10.

company.name: 8 Uur Overwerken Voor Het Goede Doel

volunteer_experiences.description:
Finding solutions to help create a bigger sharing economy within the Netherlands with as a target to bring light on the possibilities of Hitchhiking to save money, reduce CO2 outcome and create new connections with people you normally never meet.

As a result we presented various campaign communication plans together with the design of a promotion video, stickers, banners, quotes and creative approaches to bring more awareness around the posibilities and the ease of hitchhiking.

volunteer_experiences.role: Problem solver & projectmanager team "Een Steekje Los"
volunteer_experiences.description:
"Een Steekje Los" is the game for anyone who cares about mental health. Choose depth, socializing, or both. This social health game helps to talk about personal questions and struggles. It shows the great sides of life beside a the challenge of making personal uncertainties negotiable.

Their problem was that the workshops they give need alot of resources which cannot be taken elsewhere without a big car. We had to come up with creative solutions and new technology to make it easy of shipping their communication resources (from banners to presentation tables and more). We designed new promotional materials using latest technology and which added value to their core values. With a multidiciplairy team of five we presented solutions which they are using today.

The day was part of the first "8 uur overwerken voor het goede doel" (8h volunteering for a charity) day and after that, the initiative attracted a wide range of cities that organised the sequel of this great event the following years.
Helped SingularityU the Netherlands in defining & executing a Social Media strategy that resulted in being two days trending topic in both NL and Belgium during the annual Summit.

Helping to create and host technology all across the Netherlands as an open source for inspiration where people learn and share insights and help each other further with tech. Located in several places, like S2M Utrecht, S2M Eindhoven, Bangladesh and popups during public hackathons and festival events.
